content.query:
create schema copydwh go

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'nyc_taxi_reporting' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'copydwh')
CREATE TABLE copydwh.nyc_taxi_reporting
	(
	 [PULocationID] int,
	 [DOLocationID] int,
	 [total_trip_count] bigint,
	 [total_fare_amount] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

COPY INTO copydwh.nyc_taxi_reporting
(PULocationID 1, DOLocationID 2, total_trip_count 3, total_fare_amount 4)
FROM 'https://dlsrsynapsecourse.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/gold_layer/trip_data_green_agg'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
	,auto_create_table = 'ON'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM copydwh.nyc_taxi_reporting
GO
